title: For Sale/Trade:  Rossi 92 44Mag Stainless 24in Octagon Barrel
postcontent:
For sale is a Rossi Model 92. It's in 44 Magnum, Stainless finish, with 24 inch  octagon barrel.

The following changes were made to the gun in anticipation of using it for deer hunting: 

Yellow Plastic Follower replaced with a Stainless Steel Follower
Original Magazine Spring replaced with a Stainless Magazine Spring
Ejector Spring replaced with a more reliable one
Front Gold Dot Sight Blade replaced with a Green Fiber Optic Blade
Rear Buckhorn Sight removed and replaced with a Dovetail Slot Blank
Useless Bolt Safety removed and replaced with an Adjustable Peep Sight

--- All above parts are from Steve's Guns, who specializes in Rossi 92 upgrades and improvements ---

The internals were polished as best as could be without effecting the lock up of any parts. Not a thing is loose, and it cycles smoother than any Rossi out of the box. Also added black paracord wrap to part of the lever. 

There is a small gouge in the barrel from the front sight installation, but nothing too noticeable, as well as minor surface scratches in the receiver.

Face to Face sale around my area, with Valid Ohio I.D. or CHL only please.



Sorry there's no picture of the entire gun, it's just too long!

title: For Sale/Trade:  Colt .22lr M4 w/lots of Mods and extras
postcontent:
The Colt M4 OPS is a “true to the original” replica of the current version of the M-16 machine gun issued to special forces operators in the U.S. Like the original, the replica features a Ops length barrel, collapsible stock, and quad skeleton forend with accessory rails. Like the military issues, the upper and lower receiver is made of high quality aluminum. The Colt M4 Ops Semi-Automatic Rifle in .22 L.R. is manufactured exclusively by Walther under license from Colt. It is the only genuine Colt tactical rimfire replica available in the world.

The rifle i have has had alot of aftermarket parts added and it really makes this thing fun to shoot. It looks nothing like the factory model. It has low round count about 500 or so. It likes quality .22lr ammo and thats all i have fed her. Here are a list of mods and extras.
20" bull barrel with flash hider
Full length 13" quadrail with railed gasblock.

Extended bolt latch

1) 20rd magazine

title: For Sale:  Pen Pistol in .380 acp
postcontent:
This interesting piece looks like a pen but transforms in seconds into a working legal pistol. Most "pen guns" fall into the legal category of "any other weapon," and as such, must be registered. R.J. Braverman’s Stinger Pen Pistols, however, must be folded into a gun-like shape before firing, earning them a Title I designation from the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosives (Title I firearms are just ordinary guns with no additional regulations imposed upon them).

These little pistols were produced in the early 1990’s and were chambered for .22 LR Rimfire, .22 Magnum Rimfire, .25 ACP, .32 ACP, and .380 ACP ammunition. They were just over 5 1/2 inches in length with a 2 inch barrel when folded. This example is in .380 which is the most rare and hard to even find one on auction sites.  This pen gun comes with original pouch and paperwork. Video of me shooting below as well as a GB link for one that went for almost 900 after shipping.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nvfy5q1V1vI

http://www.gunbroker.com/Auction/ViewItem.aspx?Item=466438287

title: For Sale:  Sig Sauer SIG556XI 7.62x39 at Ventura Munitions
location: SW Corner of Russell and Valley View, Las Vegas, Nevada
postcontent:
Sig Sauer's SIG556XI introduces a whole new mode of thought to modern sporting rifles. This semi-automatic rifle gives you unparalleled modular capability in barrel length, caliber, stock configuration, and magazine type. In the SIG556XI Sig Sauer set out to produce a rifle that accepts two of the most commonly found rifle calibers in the world, 5.56x45 NATO and 7.62x39mm. By making a rifle that is easy to change the barrel, lower receiver, and bolt Sig Sauer produced a rifle that maintains Sig's reputation for being extremely reliable and accuracy, while giving the operator the modular capabilities that they asked for.

The SIG556XI features:
•3-position Gas Piston Operating System with Rotating Bolt, allowing the operator to quickly change from normal usage to suppressed usage, and mil-spec usage.
•Swiss-style folding stock with a removable cheek riser.
•Acceptance of most AK-type magazines on the market
•Locking Flip-Up front and rear sights.
Caliber: 7.62x39mm 
Overall Length: 35.8 inches
Rifling: 1 in 9.5 inches
Barrel Length: 16.0 inches
Weight without Mag: 7 lbs 1 oz
Magazine Capacity: 30 Rounds 

Available at Ventura Munitions on the SW Corner of Valley View and Russell. Call REDACTED, our store hours are 8am-5pm Mon-Fri, Sat 10am- 4pm, for more information or visit our ammo and firearms website at www.VenturaSupply.com or www.venturamunitions.com

title: For Sale/Trade:  ALG Single Chamber muzzle brake
postcontent:
I have a lightly used alg single chamber muzzle brake that I would be interested in selling or preferably trading.

It's lightly used and has only had about 200 rounds through it with it on the rifle, bought new earlier this month. Does reduce recoil as intended, but I think I'd like to try something different. These work particularly well on ar pistols and help tame the recoil and muzzle rise (while throwing 5 foot fireballs out the side!). Will fit on any ar15 with standard threads or barrel with the same threads. Will come with two washers, I believe one is a peel and one is a crush, but they are used and I can not guarantee they will work on your rifle, so you may need to get a new one.

I'd like to trade for Magpul Pmags, I'd trade for 3 of them in 30 or 20 round versions. Might also trade for. 223/5.56 ammo, but would prefer mags. 
If not wanting to trade I'd sell for $30.

If interested feel free to call/text me at three 1 six 6 one 9 nine 8 five 3, texts preferred.
 Thanks!

title: For Sale:  Remington 742 in 30-06. Auto loader basket weave patern $475, Edmond
postcontent: This rifle is cool.  I have had it since around 2007 or so. I've shot in maybe 30 times or so sighting it in and verifying its zero.  I got if off this older guy at a gun show not a vendor,  I traded a pistol for it and gave home a little cash.  The first two deer I shot with this dropped in their tracks.  One at 110 yards and the other at 145 yards. It has a sling, a 3x9 Busnell scope, the original mag and a spare mag, and a butt pad. This rifle is squared away all the way around. Got another rifle no need for this anymore. Not willing to trade or ship.  I have it sighted in at 1.5inches high at 100 yards and it likes 150 grain Horandy Interlock. This is a great package. Pretty firm on this price. This is a classic and is very nice. Will let go without the sling or scope for 425. This rifle was produced between 1978 and 1980 with a serial number around B705xxx.

These guns are absolutely devastating at ranges exceeding 1 mile. For the civilian NFA collector and shooter, the M2 50 cal belt fed machine gun represents the maximum level of firepower one can acquire. Relatively few M2's were legally built and registered for civilian use prior to 1986. As a result these guns have continued to climb in price to levels once thought unlikely with no end in sight. title: For Sale:  HK USP 9mm LEM w/18rd hi-cap jet funnel mags, night sights, orig. box
postcontent:
Up for sale is an HK USP 9mm LEM (V7) with factory installed jet funnel kit that includes the original box, manual, original test fire round and even the original HK sticker that came with the gun.  The Mepro Light night sights are bright and the gun has less than 250 rounds fired.  This USP includes a factory installed LEM trigger (Law Enforcement Modification trigger system with a bobbed hammer) and the HK Jet Funnel kit installed by the factory along with two HK Jet Funnel high capacity 18 round magazines (LE marked)  that give the pistol a total capacity of 19.  The LEM trigger pull is smooth and the gun is a soft shooter.  Unlike most HK USPs this gun came from the factory with the LEM kit installed and the Jet Funnel kit installed.  If you were to buy this new and buy these options, it would run you between $925-$1050 for gun and parts, plus HK service installation costs if you wanted it HK installed.  

All pictures have the serial number covered and there are no marks on this gun, but it is possible an errant spec of dust or lint was on the gun when the photos were taken.  Gun has no slide wear, no frame scratches and has never been carried or holstered.  Great for range use, advanced pistol training and carry/concealed carry (if you aren't a small person.) 

Ohio D/L required, prefer Ohio CCW holders.

title: For Sale/Trade:  New in Box DiamondBack DB9FS full size 9mm 15+1
postcontent:
This new 9mm pistol is a double-action, striker-fire designed platform that incorporates an ergonomically driven polymer double stack frame with a stainless steel slide.  With extensive research on the form and function of the tactile-enhanced grip, the operator will find the design enhances control, while providing consistent hand placement. The flared magwell aids in fast and reliable reloads while the extended magazine base pad provides a secure grip during loading, handling and shooting the DB FS Nine. 

Diamondback has incorporated a trigger safety and firing pin block safety with a short, positive reset, minimizing trigger travel for faster cycle times. A cocking indicator is located at the rear of the slide, providing visual and tactical recognition. For quick target acquisition, fixed, three-dot sights are mounted onto the stainless slide.  Both front and rear tactical serrations provide firm engagement between the user’s hand and the DB FS Nine's slide, allowing for a better grip during manipulation. The dust cover has an integrated MIL-STD1913 Picatinny rail for tactical lights, lasers and other accessories, extending its versatility for everyday carry, home defense, training or use on the range. The 4.75” Chromemoly barrel on the DB FS Nine provides a long, 6.25” sight radius, aiding the overall accuracy of the pistol during practice and competition.

postcontent:
This is a lightly used Advanced Armament Corp. AR-15 Upper Receiver Assembly in 300 AAC Blackout is a pin-on, ready-to-shoot top end for use with any standard AR-15 lower receiver.

Has 220 rounds through it, all factory, subsonic & supersonic and flawless with every shot. Selling to finance an SBR in the same setup. Save money on this great deal!

The Mil-Spec 4150 chrome moly vanadium steel barrel comes equipped with 1 in 7" twist rifling, M4 feed ramps, a low profile steel gas block, and is finished inside and out with a protective black nitride treatment for superior durability and corrosion resistance. The muzzle is threaded with a 5/8"-24 pitch for easy installation of a silencer, and is topped off with an effective AAC 51T Blackout flash hider.

The upper features a forged M4-Style flat-top receiver onto which a Knight's Armament free floating URX 3.1 Quad Rail System is rigidly attached. The heat-treated, full auto bolt carrier is finished in a slick Nickel Boron coating, and comes equipped with a properly-staked gas key and Carpenter 158 steel bolt assembly.

This 16" 300 Blackout upper utilizes the versatile carbine length gas system, a good choice for this cartridge if various weights and types of ammunition are to be used. Most subsonic and supersonic loads, fired from either a suppressed or unsuppressed gun, are compatible with this configuration. However, some subsonic ammunition may not always cycle reliably under adverse conditions or in a severely fouled firearm without a sound suppressor attached to provide extra backpressure.

Parker Hale 30-06
Made in England

This is a commercial Mauser action. 100% true to the original 98 Mauser except for the safety lever moved from rear of bolt to beside the receiver. Claw extractor, controlled feed (will chamber a round at any angle, including upside down). These are the go-to rifles for dangerous game hunting, and the Mauser 98 is arguably the strongest action out there. 

Forged receiver, all stainless bolt / shroud / firing pin. Hammer forged barrel. Fully adjustable trigger. Semi-beavertail Monte Carlo stock with satin finish (traditional oil finish, not polyurethane. Scratches are easy to fix).

The Magpul Battery Assist Device (B.A.D.) is an extended bolt release that allows the shooter to keep his hand in the ready position on the pistol grip and operate the bolt catch with the trigger finger. Streamlines bolt catch manipulation to get the weapon into battery more quickly for improved operator readiness and weapon handling efficiency. Easy to install and remove—no weapon disassembly required. The B.A.D. lever clamps securely to the factory bolt release with a Torx® head screw and extends a paddle through the front of the triggerguard to the right-hand side of the weapon. Trigger finger can stay outside the triggerguard as you operate the lever, and factory bolt catch retains normal function with B.A.D. installed. Made of a high-grade aluminum alloy, hardcoat anodized to MIL-A-8625F, Type III, Class 2 spec for extra strength and wear resistance.

title: For Sale:  North American Arms Sidewinder .22 WMR Mini Revolver
postcontent: Up for sale is a Brand New in Box Never Fired North American Arms Sidewinder .22 WMR Mini Revolver Call or TXT Joe @ (602) 3 six 1 seven 2 7 three or REDACTED There has been a lot going on at North American Arms, not the least of which is more focus on their “Curious, Custom and Collectible Shop,” which is your chance to own some of the more exclusive editions of NAA firearms. For info on those items, please see the NAA website. For the Sidewinder, let's start with the basic specifications: • Part Number NAA-SW • Caliber: 22 WMR • Capacity: 5 • Barrel Length: 1 inch • Overall Length: 5 inches • Overall Height: 2-7/8 in. • Width: 1-1/16 in. • Weight Unloaded: 6.7 oz The single-action Sidewinder Mini Revolver, scheduled for introduction at NRA Annual Meetings & Exhibits, features a swing-out cylinder connected to a frame-mounted crane arm. The cylinder falls to the right side of the revolver when the cylinder pin is pulled forward to release it from the frame. With the cylinder to the side, the cylinder pin actuates an ejector star to eject spent cartridges. The addition of these new features to the Sidewinder has increased the weight of the revolver by only a fraction of an ounce in comparison to the standard .22 Mag. mini, but reloading will be a much faster and simpler process. The first Sidewinders off the line will be chambered for .22 Mag. only, but .22 Long Rifle conversion cylinder assemblies will not be far behind. The pre-production model is fitted with a 1 5/8-inch barrel, but the development team is working to make a shorter barrel available.
